mapper.update: update sportzplatform.address set address_line1 = #{addressLine1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_line2 = #{addressLine2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_line3 = #{addressLine3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postal_code = #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longtitude = #{longtitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select address_id, address_line1, address_line2, address_line3, postal_code, city, state, country, latitude, longtitude from sportzplatform.address where address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select address_id, address_line1, address_line2, address_line3, postal_code, city, state, country, latitude, longtitude from sportzplatform.address
